TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CatchBlock extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents a catch statement in a try block.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Catch%2A> methods can be used to create a CatchBlock.

Docs.summary: Gets the body of the catch block.
Docs.value: The <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression"> object representing the catch body.

Docs.summary: Gets the body of the <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.CatchBlock"> filter.
Docs.value: The <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression"> object representing the body of the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.CatchBlock> filter.

Docs.summary: Gets the type of <see cref="T:System.Exception"> this handler catches.
Docs.value: The <see cref="T:System.Type"> object representing the type of <xref:System.Exception> this handler catches.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a <see cref="T:System.String"> that represents the current <xref:System.Object>.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.String"> that represents the current <xref:System.Object>.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Linq.Expressions.CatchBlock Update (System.Linq.Expressions.ParameterExpression variable, System.Linq.Expressions.Expression filter, System.Linq.Expressions.Expression body);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.Linq.Expressions.CatchBlock Update(class System.Linq.Expressions.ParameterExpression variable, class System.Linq.Expressions.Expression filter, class System.Linq.Expressions.Expression body) cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a new expression that is like this one, but using the supplied children. If all of the children are the same, it will return this expression.
Docs.returns: This expression if no children are changed or an expression with the updated children.

Docs.summary: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Exception"> object caught by this handler.
Docs.value: The <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ParameterExpression"> object representing a reference to the <xref:System.Exception> object caught by this handler.
